### **Model definitions**

This will be the last building section of the *GEE* model. The user will be able to identify his model with a specific name, this name will be used for later stages and as a download identifier name. The **model description** is optional, the user can describe his model in this text box. After clicking the button your *GEE* model is ready for analysis. The model can be viewed in the **GEE Models** menu.
